hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Atiyyah, that Abu Sa’eed said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever lets his lower wrap drag out of pride, Allah will not look at him on the Day of Resurrection.” He ( ‘Atiyyah) said "I met Ibn 'Umar in Al-Balaat so I mentioned Abu Sa'eed's hadith from the Prophet (ﷺ). So he said and pointed to his ears 'My two ears heard it, and my heart preserved it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ جَرَّ ثَوْبَهُ مِنَ الْخُيَلاَءِ
chapter.eng-name: One who lets his garment drag out of pride
